name: age
text: How old are you?

name: child_instructions
text:
This questionnaire is designed to determine whether a child or teenager demonstrates symptoms similar to those of children with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) and is intended to be used as a screening tool; it is not diagnostic.

If your answers indicate that the child or teenager's symptoms are consistent with the DSM-5 criteria for ADHD, consult your family doctor and/or a psychologist who is trained and experienced in completing assessments for ADHD in children. An accurate diagnosis can only be made through clinical evaluation by a trained mental health professional.

You need to answer 27 questions to receive a score.
hint: http://www.pediatricenter.com/assets/forms/Conners_Parent_Rating.pdf
answer.1: I understand that this is not a diagnostic tool

name: adult_instructions
text:
This questionnaire is designed to determine whether you demonstrate symptoms similar to those of adults with Attention Deficit Disorder (ADHD) and is intended to be used as a screening tool; it is not diagnostic.

If you answer 'often' or 'very often' to a significant number of these questions, consult your family doctor and/or a psychologist who is trained and experienced in completing assessments for Adult ADHD. An accurate diagnosis can only be made through clinical evaluation by a trained mental health professional.

You need to answer 18 questions to receive a score.
hint: https://add.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/adhd-questionnaire-ASRS111.pdf
answer.1: I understand that this is not a diagnostic tool

name: child_guess_your_score
text:
Guess your ADHD score
Before we get started, what do you think might be the child or teenager's ADHD score?

name: inattentive
text: 1: How often has the child or teenager been inattentive or easily distracted?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: angry
text: 2: How often has the child or teenager been angry and resentful?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: homework
text: 3: How often has the child or teenager had difficulty in doing or completing their homework?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: motor
text: 4: How often is the child or teenager always "on the go" or acts as if driven by a motor?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: attention-span
text: 5: How often has the child or teenager exhibited short attention span?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: argues
text: 6: How often has the child or teenager argued with adults?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: fidget
text: 7: How often has the child or teenager fidgeted with hands or feet or squirmed in seat?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: assignments
text: 8: How often has the child or teenager failed to complete their assignments?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: control
text: 9: How often has the child or teenager felt hard to control in malls or while grocery shopping?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: disorganized
text: 10: How often has the child or teenager been messy or disorganized at home or school?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: temper
text: 11: How often did the chiild lose their temper?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: supervision
text: 12: How often has the child or teenager needed close supervision to get through their assignments?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: attends
text: 13: How often does the child or teenager only attend something if they are very interested in it?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: climbs
text: 14: How often does the child or teenager run about or climb excessively in situations where it is inappropriate?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: distracted
text: 15: How often has distractibility or attention span been a problem?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: irritable
text: 16: How often has the child or teenager been irritable?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: engaging
text: 17: How often does the child or teenager avoid, express reluctance about, or has difficulties engaging in tasks that require sustained mental effort (such as schoolwork of homework)?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: restless-squirmy
text: 18: How often has the child or teenager been restless in the "squirmy" sense?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: insructions
text: 19: How often does the child or teenager get distracted when given instructions to do something?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: defies
text: 20: How often does the child or teenager actively defy or refuse to comply with adults' requests?

name: concentrating
text: 21: How often does the child or teenager have trouble concentrating in class?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: awaiting
text: 22: How often does the child or teenager have difficulty waiting in lines or awaiting their turn in games or group situations?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: classroom
text: 23: How often doe sthe child or teenager leave their seat in classroom or in other situations in which remaining seated is expected?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: annoy
text: 24: How often does the child or teenager deliberately do things that annoy other people?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: follow-through
text: 25: How often does the child or teenager not follow through on instructions and fail to finish schoolwork, chores or duties in the workplace (not due to oppositional behvaior or failure to understand instructions)?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: playing
text: 26: How often does the child or teenager have difficulty playing or engaging in leisure activities quietly?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: frustrated
text: 27: How often has the child or teenager felt easily frustrated in their efforts?
hint: Below are a number of common problems that children have. For each question, ask yourself, "How much of a problem has this been in the last month?"

name: adult_guess_your_score
text:
Guess your ADHD score
Before we get started, what do you think might be your ADHD score?

name: project
text: 1: How often do you have trouble wrapping up the final details of a project, once the challenging parts have been done?

name: order
text: 2: How often do you have difficulty getting things in order when you have to do a task that requires organization?

name: remember
text: 3: How often do you have problems remembering appointments or obligations?

name: delay
text: 4: When you have a task that requires a lot of thought, how often do you avoid or delay getting started?

name: fidget
text: 5: How often do you fidget or squirm with your hands or feet when you have to sit down for a long time?

name: over-active
text: 6: How often do you feel overly active and compelled to do things, like you were driven by a motor?

name: mistakes
text: 7: How often do you make careless mistakes when you have to work on a boring or difficult project?

name: attention
text: 8: How often do you have difficulty keeping your attention when you are doing boring or repetitive work?

name: concentrate
text: 9: How often do you have difficulty concentrating on what people say to you, even when they are speaking to you directly?

name: misplace
text: 10: How often do you misplace or have difficulty finding things at home or at work?

name: distracted
text: 11: How often are you distracted by activity or noise around you?

name: leave
text: 12: How often do you leave your seat in meetings or other situations in which you are expected to remain seated?

name: restless
text: 13: How often do you feel restless or fidgety?

name: unwind
text: 14: How often do you have difficulty unwinding and relaxing when you have time to yourself?

name: talking
text: 15: How often do you find yourself talking too much when you are in social situations?

name: conversation
text: 16: When youâ€™re in a conversation, How often do you find yourself finishing the sentences of the people you are talking to, before they can finish them themselves?

name: waiting
text: 17: How often do you have difficulty waiting your turn in situations when turn taking is required?

name: interrupt
text: 18: How often do you interrupt others when they are busy?
